page.title: 08Changes in Illogan.
page.content: We interviewed 34 old people in our area.They said that{land use,transport and the{way of life}had changed in the past{50}years.{Farmland}has been built on.50 years ago there were no strikes or school dinners.As there was no school bus boys from{Portreath}had to walk to{Illogan school}and they were caned quite often.Boys and girls went to separate schools.They used bicycles and fewer people had cars.They thought children are spoilt today but they said the old days were better because people were more friendly.One man went to Egypt in the war and another was in the{R.A.F}in{N.France.}Most thought the war was worth fighting and there were parties on{V.E}day.Everyone was glad when the war was over.{
